item.title: Planning to retire at 65? Most Americans have to stop working earlier.
item.description: Most Americans are forced to retire earlier than they had expected, often disrupting their financial planning.

item.title: Parents advocate for food allergy awareness after daughter's tragic death
item.description: "It's tragic and it doesn't need to happen to anyone else."
